alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 12:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NASSAU AND SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM EDT... At 1256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Marys. A strong thunderstorm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Fernandina Beach, Kings Bay Base, Dungeness, and Cumberland Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
